1.content: it was qiet day in the community, and there were no missons to go on and Betty had gained a bit of weight during her vacation. All the girls in the community had gained a bit of weight.
1.title: Lets Begin

11.content:
"What a weird dream," Betty yawned as she woke up from her sleep. "I guess its time for me to get ready for school."

As she began to get changed for school, Betty realised that she was really hungry. She quickly threw on her skirt and blouse, but not before forgetting to put on some underwear. She then put on a pair of ankle-strap pumps, grabbed a pair of panties, picked up her backpack (into which she threw said panties) and headed out of the house.

While leaving her house she saw an advertisement for a new restaurant. On the ad, there was a picture of a very fat 15 year old girl in a bikini with the caption, "You'll never know what beauty is until you gain some lovehandles. So come on down and eat and Tubbelina's."

After hearing her tummy growl, Betty decided to goand eat at this new place. Just as she was about to leave...
11.title: An new morning, and a new restaurant

choices: Betty and Penelope find a seat
111.content:
"Hey there cute stuff," called out Penelope as she walked over to Betty. For a long time she and Betty had been rivals, but in recent years the two had become quite the friends (and possibly more). "I see you also received one of those ads, and that you again forgot to put on your panties."

"So I forgot to put my pnties on again," said Betty. "I was in a rush, and I'm still going to put them on as soon as I go to the new restaurant. Its not like anyone is going to see my bare bottom, is it?"

Just as she said that, a breeze picked up and blew her skirt up, revealing a slightly plump bottom. Penelope quickly did her best to help Betty make herself at least a bit more decent.

After that was done, Penelope agreed to escort Betty to the new restaurant. "We are so lucky to not have first period, you know that Betty?" Penelope said as they arrived at the restaurant. On the door was a sign that said "No boys allowed in this restaurant" in English and French.

This is going to be great thought Betty. No boys, good food. Oh yeah...
111.title: Penelope arrives

choices: Penelope does mind but says she does't
1111.content:
There were't many people in the restaurant. One fat girl with blond hair. The other girl wore a cowboy hat that covered her face in the shadow. She had something familiar bur Betty didn't knew what.

"Here i found a table." Penelope said.

"Keep my place occupied. I'm going to the toilet to put my panties on. Be back in a sec."

"Okay."

After Betty went too the toilets Penelope also noticed the girl with the cowboy hat. Penelope also found something familiar about her. It was hard to tell or the girl saw her because her face kept hidden in the shadow.

Finally Betty returned.

"Hee Betty noticed that girl? I got the feeling i know her. But i just don't from where."

"Hee! Who are you?" Betty asked as she walked to the girl.

The girl laughed and said: "Helo Betty. I wondered or you still would recognize your best friend."

The girl pushed her hat to the back of her head. Now you could see her face.

"Paloma?"

"Who else did you expect? Noah? No boy's remember. I also got an ad."

Penelope never liked it when Paloma was around. She was always afraid that Betty would fall in love with Paloma instead of her. After all Betty and Paloma already were friends when she and Betty where still rivals. Too bad for Penelope that she did't know that Betty and Paloma were only very good friends and wanted to keep it that way.

"Hee Paloma come sit with us." Betty said. " You don't mind right Penelope?"
1111.title: Paloma with a cowboy hat

11111.content:
"Actually, I do mind Betty," said Penelope.

Betty responded to that with a confused look. Then turning to Paloma said, "sorry, but we are kinda here together. Plus, Penelope does kinda like to hang out with me on her own."

"Oh, well that's too bad," said Paloma. "Well then, I'll see ya later."

After Paloma left, a beautiful blond waitress came up to get Betty and Paloma's orders. As she came to her table, Penelope noticed how the buttons on her shirt strained to contain her plump belly and large breasts, and how tightly her skirt hugged her backside. "Hello, my name is Caitlyn," said the waitress, "and I will be your waitress this morning. Here are your menus, and what would you like to drink today? I'd recommend the Bloated Bovine Dairy Milk."

This piqued the girls' curiosity. "Bloated Bovine Dairy?" Asked Penelope. Caitlyn proceeded to explain that the Bloated Bovine Dairy was a special free-range farm where the cows were allowed to roam free, but given specially treated food that promoted greatly increased weight gain while still maintaining their health. After hearing her explanation, Penelope and Betty both ordered some of the milk. After taking up their orders, Caitlyn walked from the table to get the drinks.

"So what do you think looks good, Penelope?" asked Betty. " I'm thinking I'll have a plate of the triple Butter-soaked Pancakes."
11111.title: Betty and Penelope Meet their Waitress

111111.content:
"I guess I'll have some of those pancakes, too," said Penelope.

Moments later, their waitress confirmed their orders, adding that with each order came a came a complimentary dessert. As the girls watched Caitlyn (their waitress) saunter off to deliver their meal order, Betty took her first sip of the milk. After taking her first sip, Betty felt quite the sensation come over her. A chill ran quickly down her spine, followed by a warm feeling between her legs, and soon she felt the urge to take another drink.

With each drink she took, Betty soon felt something happen inside her body. It was not long before she realized that she needed a refill. And all this time, Penelope had also imbibed her entire glass as well.

"That was unbelievably good," said Betty. "It almost left me feeling quite a bit more aroused than I am used to."

"Yeah," stated Penelope, wiping some sweat from her brow. "Its almost as if the more we drink of this stuff the more we want of it. It even started to feel as though each time I took a drink, it was as if something inside me was changing." Penelope and Betty pondered what was going on in their bodies when...
111111.title: Penelope orders the pancakes

choices: Yes, we will have some cake
No, we had better head to class
1111111.content:
"Here are the Pancakes you ordered," said Caitlyn. "It looks like you enjoyed your drinks, so I'll just get you a quick refill."

After the girls thanked Caitlyn, they each prepared to eat their pancakes. Betty was the first to get her hands on the butter, of which she put a dollop on her top pancake. Penelope then did the same with her pancakes, and soon both of them had poured syrup over their own stack.

By the time Caitlyn had shown up with their drinks, both of the girls had already begun to eat their pancakes. Both girls had already begun to seem oblivious to the fact that everything that could be consumed in the restaurant was designed to promote weight gain.

Soon the girls had scarfed down much of their pancakes. Betty had eaten the most with no sign of slowing, while Penelope had done her best to take her time. Soon they were both finished, having each consumed a full stack of pancakes topped with butter and syrup. Betty even drank the most milk between them, having gone through five glasses full, compared to Penelope's three.

Their bodies were already showing some bloating from their main courses when Caitlyn invited them to have some complimentary cake. "It's free for every new customer," she said. But the girls had to consult with each other first before making a decision. Ultimately, they decided...
1111111.title: Caitlyn brought them their pancakes

11111112.content:
"I'm sorry but we have to head to class," said Betty as she rubbed her tummy.

As Caitlyn left to pick up their check, Betty noticed Penelope squirming on her side of the table. Betty wonder what was wrong, and asked her friend what she was doing.

"I'm sorry for all the squirming Betty," Penelope said. "It's just that my panties seem tighter all of a sudden. If you'll excuse me, I'll head to the toilet to take care of this"

With that, Penelope got up to headed to the restroom. As she walked away, Betty noticed that Penelope's butt looked a bit larger. Even her thighs looked like they had lost some muscle tone, with fat in its place. Betty immediately realized her panties were just a tad tighter, as was her skirt. And yet, she seemed to like the thought of being slightly bigger.

Just as Betty started to get lost in her thoughts, Caitlyn showed up with the check for their meal. She was surprised to see how inexpensive the meal was, what with it being only 12.50 (Canadian) Dollars. Betty pulled out enough money to cover the price and the tip from her pocket.

Betty then proceeded to wait for Penelope, who showed up soon after. As the two of them gathered their purses and left for class, Caitlyn picked up their check.

And with that the girls headed off to their first class...
11111112.title: No, we had better head to class

11112.content:
Betty was looking cute at Penelope "Please sweetie she's my best friend". Betty whines.

Penelope was thinking about letting Paloma hang with them; in Penelope's mind she imagines the outcome of letting Paloma hang with her and Betty. As the visions start; Betty and Penelope, Paloma were ordering their breakfast.

Betty orders the lard rump flap jacks, the gut buster bacon strips, the thunder thighs apple fretters and for her beverage she ordered overdosed sugar coffee

Penelope orders the same as Betty did. She loved her usual.

Paloma was feeling ravenous, she ordered the barns regulars super special.
11112.title: Penelope does mind but says she does't

12.content: You are now the rival of Betty, how will you start your adventure
12.title: Penelope

121.content:
it was a peaceful evening as penelope had guests over that night: Betty, Megan, Sarah, and Paloma. Penelope had invited these ladies over for a slumber party because she want some company, as the group were sitting in the living room waiting their hostess to appear.

The girls were getting tired as Penelope was taking a while to get ready, as Betty goes to see if Penelope was having trouble as Betty waddles up to Penelopes' room, as she climbs the stairs she gets winded and stops to catch her breath "Stupid stairs why does there have to be so many of them".

as Betty waddles to Penelopes' room she knocks on her door "Penelope are you aright?" Betty asks through the door. as the door opens Betty screams as Penelope is a twig compared to her

152.title: Betty's Mom

155.content: How about Betty's female friend Paloma? She sure will look cute with some extra pounds, won't she?
155.title: Paloma

1551.content:
"Oh. Some times i would like it when people did't need to wake up." Paloma said.

She got up on her feet.

"But a girl need to go to school so i don't really have a choice."

She put on a pink shirt and some blue jeans. They felt a little tight. She gained some pounds in the vacation. She and Betty spend a lot of the vacation eating ice cream, fries, burgers and other kind of junk food. Everywhere they went. Shopping in the town or take a swim, always they saw a snack bar and they could't resist to get some of the fatty food.

"Good thing vacation is over. Or else i would turn into a blimp. I wonder how Betty is doing. She must have put on some pounds as well. Don't need to worry about it. Now school has started again i will work it of."

She rubbed her belly that started to growl.

"Let's go get some breakfast."

She looked outside.

"Hmm. Maybe i can get something to eat on the way to school. Just a last piece of junk food before going back to school. It was a fun vacation with Betty. That's kind of strange." She suddenly noticed. Betty normally always needed to go somewhere and was gone for some time. But nothing like that happened in the vacation. "I hope it stays that way."

And she walked to the nearest snack bar and ordered four burgers.

After she finished her last burger she let out a small belch.

"Oops! Excuse me."

She looked at her watch.

"Oh men i need to run if i wanna be in time at school!"

She was fast running to school. There just around the corner would be the school. She ran around the corner and... BENG! She ran up against...
1551.title: Vacation is over

1552.content: The how about Sarah? One of the side kicks of Penelope.
1552.title: Sarah

choices: No No No, thats not how it started!
15522.content:
(since the story creator didn't allow for orignal stories but rather started a story line right off I have to make a new start here ignoring the first chapter)

The Star Cruiser zipped through space bound for the binary system of Utamu with it's crew of 3 on board.

"What did you say our ETA was X-5?!" Betty shrieked, X-5 turned in his chair to face betty and repeated his statment "Approximately 6 hours 18 minuets 52 seconds and 26 nano sec-""WHAT?!?" Betty cut him off screeming franticly "But I have tickets to a REALLY rocking concer tonight! Paloma and I are supposed to meet up to go there at 6 o'clock! thats just 2 and a half hours from now! I thought Utamu was like a 30 minute trip if we used the Dimanai Worm hole!" Betty exclaimed half climbed on to her arm rest as she gladed down on X-5 from her perch. "I am sorry commander but the Dimanai worm hole is unstable and the other end is constantly leaping aroung that sector, currenty it is letting out into Restricted Zone 44-B and thus not open to traffic." X-5 replied calmly despite Betty's stare. "But thats even better! that zone is so close to Utamu that 1 of it's planets skims the edge of it! that means we can get there in 15 min! Sparky set course for the Dimanai Worm Hole!""Ay-ye My captain" the young green man in the front seat called out and gunned the engines. "Miss Barrett you know that sector is off limits!" X-5 protested "Zone 44-B in particular is listed as absoulutly no one without athutority may enter it without approval by 3 ranking generals of the Galactic Guardian Defence force. It's a class 5 danger zone!" X-5 squaked losing his usual robotic calmness" "Whats Class 5 mea-" Sparky started before being cut off by Betty "nothing" She impatiantly told him wanting to just get the mission over with "it just means the Galactic Guardian's are worried by somethign there and for all civilians safty closed off the area and put up kill lasers to keep people out, but we are Galactic Guardian and thus have access and thus can pass through the area to cut 12 HOURS OFF OUR TRIP!" She finished glaring at X-5 again "Commander that zone has had 14 ships go missing in it since the Galactic Guardian archives were started, my data banks have listings of 18 sightings of strange phenominon, 23 unexplainable anomolies and a whole list of unknown creatures said to be lurking there. before it was restricted and all information of it was silenced, which predates your service with the Galactic Guardian by the way, it was called the Zone of Death!" X-5 retorted wishign to end this pointless conversation and begin the extreamely long trip. Betty just bent over the arm rest of her chair facing away from X-5 for something. X-5 sighed as betty's action caused her stiff skirt to go horizontal and show off her panties as Sparky pretended not to look. Betty rolled back into her chair with a magnet from some pizza resturant in her hand. "See this?" she said holding the magnet up to X-5 with a menising look in her eyes "this says you'll stop giving me warnings and start plannign a route through that zone so we can get this mission over with". X-5 just turn back in his chair without a word and started ploting the course, clearly she wasn't giving up and if she was threatening him with a magnet she ment buisness... the last time his circuts got to close to a magnet all his logic centers went off line and he started thinking he was a pro racecar driver, no telling what could happen this time..

The small ship flew through the stars bound for the near by worm hole
15522.title: Deadly Mistakes

155221.content:
WARNING WARNING PLEASE TURN YOUR SHIP AROUND, THIS WORM HOLE IS OFFLIMITS FOR THE TIME BEING AS IT IS LEADING TO A RESTICTED ZONE, PELASE TURN AROUND OR THE AUTO TURRENTS WILL FIRE ON YOU!

"Sparky send that beacon our authorization code before they fire on us!" Betty screemed as the automated warning blared in the cockpit of their ship "I'm trying to Captain but we were going faster than I thought, we zipped right into the warning area before I had it ready" Sparky said as he franticly entered the keys. X-5 Sighed, they were going into extreamely dangerous space and already things were off to a bad start. "Here" X-5 said as he punched in the code and deactivated the warning. "Thank you X-5" Betty said. The small ship zipped into the worm hole and out the other side second later. "whoa" Sparky uttered as they came into veiw of the resticted zone, there were wrecked ship parts everywhere, the stars that should usual be visible were darkened and strange spores seemed to float around. "so this is the restriced zone" Betty said finally, "doesn't look so bad, if it wasn't for the light dampeners to keep people from seeing in here it wouldn't be so... omninous..." she trailed off. "lets just get out of here before we get in trouble" X-5 said sendinding the flight path to Sparky. The ship sped on to the intended target however a small spore latched onto the hull of the ship before it could reach warp speeds...
155221.title: A doom with a veiw

1552211.content:
Betty Sparky and X-5 cruised on to their destination unaware of the hitchiker they've picked up...

"ETA to border of resticted zone 2 minuets Commander" X-5 said in as mono tone voice as he could muster despite this displeasure over their location. "Very good X-5, I'm going to go freashen up before we reach The Venma Planet in Utamu" Betty said before getting up and heading to the bathroom. meanwhile outside the ship the small spore crept along the haul until it found a spot were two armor plates met, slowly the spore squeze itself into the crevas working it's way inside. Inside one of the ships enviromantal control ducts the small spore dropped. it had already doubled in size having been exposed to the nutrient enriched air and was now close to the size of a pea. The Spore moved through the duct and came to the vwnt feeding the cockpit. A small thred like protusion come the from the spore through the vent and on the end a yellow drop the spore used for sight, the eye looked at X-5 and began to concentate slowly developing a red glow in it's center as it peered into X-5's internal workings to veiw his anatomy. "Mechanical Automaton... not suitable to my needs at all" the tiny spore thought, it then looked at Sparky and again began to look into his anatomy. "4 stomachs, a voratious appatite... interesting, his apatite is perfect yet his number of stomachs and astounding metabolism are a unique mix, however a speicies with such an effeciant digestive tract is again unacceptable" The Spore thought becoming frustated, it then noticed Betty's chair, "so there is a 3rd member, I do hope they will prove more... receptive to my needs..."

In the Bathroom Betty applied a touch more lipstick and made sure her uniform was straight "Gotta put our best foot forward" she said to herself in the mirror "if we want this species to join the Galactic Federation we need their top agent to be presentable" she smiled. The spore's yellow eye dropped from the duct and looked at Betty consentrating on her. "Remarkable... One stomach, very low metabalism by normal standards, her very make up seems adept at gainign weight... her species is perfect for me.. absolutlely perfect..." The spore thought with glee "and it's a young female to boot, I may have finally found... my champion" The spore quickly withdrew it's eye and went in serch of where the ship's crew kept their food, if it was going to put it's plan into motion it needed to develop more, after all, it had a very very important spore to produce just for Betty...
1552211.title: Child of Destiny?
